summary: The bill, titled the "Improvement of Mapping, Addresses, Geography, Elevations, and Structures Act of 2025" (IMAGES Act), aims to improve the National Flood Insurance Program (NFIP). It mandates the inclusion of planimetric features (roads, structures, etc.) and addresses in flood maps, updates map formats, directs coordination with the U.S. Geological Survey for stream flow network maintenance, requires public access to related data, and calls for regular data verification.  The bill also outlines qualifications-based selection for contracts and allocates funds for elevation data.
